segments.text: Room service , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have some shirts that need laundering , and I ’ d like my suit pressed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There is a laundry form as well as a bag in your room . Pls fill it out and the maid will come pick it up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long will it take to get my clothes back ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: To press the suit only takes 3 hours . The laundry will be returned to you tomorrow around noon time . Is that all right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s all right . Pls send someone to pick it up .
segments.speaker: S2
